com.captiveimagination.jgn.client
Class NetworkingClient

java.lang.Object
  com.captiveimagination.jgn.client.NetworkingClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class NetworkingClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

NetworkingClient is a convenience class for clients connecting into a client/server architecture.

Author:
Matthew D. Hicks

static long NOOP_DELAY

Field Detail

NOOP_DELAY

public static long NOOP_DELAY
The time in milliseconds to wait before sending a noop if no other messages are transmitted to the server. This defaults to 9000 (9 seconds).

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

connect

public void connect(IP serverAddress,
                    int serverPortUDP,
                    int serverPortTCP)
             throws java.io.IOException
Attempts to establish a connection to the server. This will send and immediately return, if you want to wait for a response use connectAndWait(). The serverPortUDP or serverPortTCP may be -1 if that protocol is not available on the server or you wish only to use one type.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

connectAndWait

public boolean connectAndWait(IP serverAddress,
                              int serverPortUDP,
                              int serverPortTCP,
                              long maxWait)
                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                              java.io.IOException
Calls connect() and then waits for a response from the server for maxWait amount of time.

Returns:
boolean if connection was successful
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException

connectResponse

public void connectResponse(PlayerJoinResponseMessage message)
This method is called when this client receives a PlayerJoinResponseMessage. This method assigns the playerId then calls all PlayerListeners.

Parameters:
message -

connectRequest

public void connectRequest(PlayerJoinRequestMessage message)
This method is called when this client receives a PlayerJoinRequestMessage from the server. This calls all listeners' createRemotePlayer method

Parameters:
message -

isConnected

public boolean isConnected()
Returns:
true if the client is currently connected to a server.

getUDPMessageServer

public UDPMessageServer getUDPMessageServer()
Returns:
The local UDPMessageServer being used to send and receive messages or null if one is not set.

getTCPMessageServer

public TCPMessageServer getTCPMessageServer()
Returns:
The local TCPMessageServer being used to send and receive messages or null if one is not set.

getPlayerMessageServer

public MessageServer getPlayerMessageServer()
Returns:
The local MessageServer being used to send and receive player messages. This favors TCPMessageServer if it is set.

getPlayerServerPort

public int getPlayerServerPort()
Returns:
The port in which player messages are sent and received.

getPlayerId

public short getPlayerId()
Returns:
This provides the player's id after a successfull connection has been established to the server. If a connection isn't complete returns -1.

setClientSession

public void setClientSession(ClientSession clientSession)
Set the ClientSession implementation used for communication with the server. DefaultClientSession is used if this is not set at runtime.

Parameters:
clientSession -
